blogsEntriesData.title: 6 Ways to Stay Healthy While Traveling

main.description:
Traveling any time soon? Better make sure you’re fit for the trip! After all, the last thing you want is to end up unwell during your long-planned holiday. We’ve rounded up six handy reminders for staying healthy while on the go.

 

Wash your hands often, for 20 seconds.

If we could track how many times the ‘Happy Birthday’ song is being sung these days, it would be topping the charts. 20 seconds (the length of the song) is the minimum time you should be washing your hands. Do it whenever you can!

 

Always pack disinfectants.

You never know who’s touched that doorknob or whose hands have been on that railing, so be sure to clean up often! Carry rubbing alcohol and hand sanitizer in your bag so you can disinfect regularly. Avoid touching your face too!

 

Boost your immune system.

Your body’s shields have to be up as you get around. Take your multivitamins regularly so you can boost your immune system. Healthy juices like orange juice are also packed with vitamin C that can help keep your body at its best.

 

Eat well.

Now (more than ever) is the time to go green. Pile those veggies on your plate because studies have shown greens help increase your antibody response. This fights infections and other unwanted germs that hijack your system and make you sick.

 

Rest up.

Save the Netflix bingeing for tomorrow and get those eight hours of sleep. You’re gonna need them. Staying up late makes you more likely to get sick when you’re exposed to a virus. You don’t want to catch a cold and have it turn into something more serious, so call it a day early enough for you to get ample rest.

 

Get insurance.

Getting sick while you’re traveling is enough of its own headache, so do everything you can to get coverage. Having insurance that covers sicknesses that you can catch while traveling (especially more serious ones) at least puts you a little more at ease. Hopefully you won’t need it though!

 

A responsible traveler puts safety first, so be sure you take all the necessary precautions as you plan your trips!

main.description:
Start packing your bags because summer is here! Whether you plan on going camping, hiking, or swimming at the beach here are some things you’ll need to bring with you can enjoy your vacation to the max while being eco-friendly!

Here are the Top 5 ways you can have fun while healing Mother Earth.

 

Going for a swim? Use a reef-safe sunscreen or wear a rashguard.

It’s important to protect yourself from the sun’s harsh UV rays and it’s just as important to protect our marine life from harsh chemicals. No sunscreen is 100% safe but there are some brands that don’t use oxybenzone and octinoxate in their sunscreen which makes them more environment-friendly.

 

Bring a water thermos to keep your cool for longer.

When travelling with a group, most people don’t finish the water from plastic bottles because:

1.) They don’t know which bottle is theirs or,

2.) The plastic has been exposed to the sun making the water unsafe to drink.

Decrease plastic waste by bringing your own personal water thermos wherever you go to keep your water refreshingly cool and safe to drink.

 

Pack your tote bags for your souvenir shopping.

Souvenir shopping is one of the highlights for these trips and we can’t help but buy at almost every shop. Instead of asking for a plastic bag for your trinkets, bring your own bag to store your haul. After all, carrying multiple different colored plastic bags will not only ruin your style, but it’s also hazardous for the environment.

 

Be a conscious consumer when buying souvenirs.

Supporting the local businesses is much appreciated but make sure that the items you’re buying did not harm any living creatures or cause damage to their eco-system. After all, this might just be a tourist spot to you, but these places are homes to others.

 

Shampoo bars are better for your and the environment.

Shampoo bars are usually made with essential oils that are good for your hair and come in eco-friendly packaging to save yourself from the hassle of opening & keeping those messy, non-biodegradable sachets.

blogsEntriesData.title: Your Guide to a Seamless Travel Experience

main.description:
Whether it’s a solo travel adventure, a romantic retreat, or a family getaway, nothing beats the bubbling excitement of an upcoming trip! While navigating unfamiliar destinations can sometimes leave you feeling overwhelmed, don’t worry! With the right mindset and preparation, you’re on your way to a seamless travel experience.

Join us as we explore essential tips to help you make the most of your trip.

 

Research your destination

Familiarity with your chosen destination is the first step to making the most of your trip. For instance, having a background in the local culture will also give you an idea of what attractions to visit, activities to try, and signature dishes to feast on.

Moreover, being aware of the destination’s customs and traditions will also help in raising awareness about the specific destination’s proper etiquette, including what to wear and how to behave in public. For example, on Boracay Island, wearing light clothing over swimwear when entering establishments is highly advised as a sign of respect for the island’s culture.

 

Create a flexible itinerary

While being spontaneous has its perks, having an outline of your travel plans, such as including your transportation, accommodation, and activities, can help transition you to a smooth sailing journey. It’s best to keep your travel itinerary flexible; it does not have to be something that you have to follow strictly. This will allow you to have more fun than worrying about following your schedule.

 

Maximize your time

A seamless travel experience includes maximizing your time. This will enable you to achieve a full travel experience as you immerse yourself in the destination’s culture, attractions, and activities. Despite the limited number of days during a vacation, the efficient use of your time can enhance the overall quality of your travel experience. This is the perfect chance to fulfill your travel aspirations as you tick off some items from your bucket list.

 

Explore your accommodation options with Discovery hotels and resorts

Choosing the right accommodation greatly matters while you are on vacation. It’s important to find comfort and ease as you relax after a long day of excursions and thrilling activities. Deeply rooted in providing a “Service That’s All Heart,” Discovery hotels and resorts are ready to welcome you to a home away from home. Whether you are seeking a breathtaking beach destination or a vibrant urban oasis, each property is meticulously designed for every discerning traveler.

Have a look at your guide below:

You can make the most of your seamless travel experience with a touch of  ‘Service That’s All Heart’ with Discovery hotels and resorts. For more information, visit our website at www.discoveryhotels-resorts.com

blogsEntriesData.title: Discovery Hospitality Corporation, Crowned as the Leading Hospitality Brand in the Philippines

main.description:
Discovery Hospitality Corporation (DHC) proudly added three more awards to its collection this year after receiving three recognitions at the World Business Outlook Awards 2023 held last November 25 at the Marriott Marquis in Bangkok, Thailand.

The World Business Outlook Awards is a prestigious event led by Singapore-based global media publication, World Business Outlook, featuring industry business updates and providing a global voice and perspective to open conversations that are game-changers. To continue its mission of delivering information with legitimacy standards, this award-giving event recognizes excellence in different industries, applauding both individuals and organizations for their remarkable performance and innovative contributions. These awards highlight top-tier business professionals and industry leaders across the globe.

This event acknowledged the outstanding achievements of DHC as this year’s ‘Leading Hospitality Brand in the Philippines’. Additionally, Ms. Blessy Townes, Vice President and Head of Digital Marketing and Branding, was honored as ‘Hospitality Digital Marketing Leader of the Year in the APAC region’. And with heartfelt delight, Mr. Jose Parreño, Jr., Chief Operating Officer of Discovery Hospitality Corporation, was presented with the esteemed title of ‘COO of the Year in the Hospitality Sector of the Philippines.’

Discovery Hospitality Corporation is a proud homegrown brand managing the Philippines’ best-loved hotels and resorts, namely Discovery Shores Boracay, Club Paradise Palawan, Discovery Suites, and Discovery Primea. Just this year, it opened two new properties: Manami Resort under its new brand called Signature Collection, and Discovery Samal, the first property to highlight the rebranded Discovery Resorts. From purely heading and operating these owned properties, DHC has trailblazed and expanded its horizons to more than just focusing on its own but also sharing its expertise from decades of experience to provide allied and shared services and property management with other businesses, all while continuing to lead its legacy onwards and upwards.

For Parreño, each award attributed to DHC serves as a reaffirmation of Discovery’s goal of achieving excellence. “We take pride in the continuous recognition from The World Business Outlook. These accolades not only inspire us but also serve as a reminder to consistently raise the standards in the hospitality field. Through continuous innovation, our aim is always to provide “Service That’s All Heart” to each and every guest,” added Parreño.

To DHC’s management team, these awards reflect their collective passion and dedication, as well as the exceptional leadership of Parreño and Townes. Every recognition, according to Parreño, “reflects the success of Discovery’s efforts and the unforgettable experience we impart on our guests.”

“Over the years, the definition of luxury travel hasn’t been merely a destination, but now the shift has moved into creating memorable and authentic experiences. By valuing each guest, we ensure they relish every moment of their stay with us, which in turn produces unparalleled service,” Parreño concluded.

Discovery Hospitality Corporation continues to solidify its brand love and remarkable connections to its guest, business partners, and internal stakeholders. It strives to deliver authentic experiences that are true to the locale and build hotel brands that inspire the modern traveler, underpinned by genuine Filipino warmth.

For inquiries on hotel management and digital shared services, contact DHC’s Senior Vice President and Head of Sales and Operations, Lynette Ermac, at lynette.ermac@discoveryhospitality.com. For more information, visit www.discoveryhospitality.com

 

PRESS

The most romantic day of the year is almost near so we’ve come up with 3 simple things you can do to make the day extra special without having to go out!

 

Breakfast in Bed

Have your significant other sleep in a little longer and whip up a sumptuous feast which you can enjoy in bed as you relax, chat and enjoy each other’s company. Or better yet, order your breakfast to be delivered to your house so you can both sleep in longer.

 

Private Viewing

Once evening rolls in, enjoy an exclusive viewing of any movie that you both feel like watching. It’s difficult to find cinemas with couple seating, but this won’t be a problem if you’ll be watching movies from your home. Order a pizza, ready the drinks and settle into your comfiest couch to cuddle with your one and only. The best part is that you don’t have to worry about noisy neighbors.

TAPENADE ON THE GO

 

Steak at Home

For dinner, prepare a special feast with so many take-home kits available. Enjoy a juicy steak cooked to perfection at your dinner table without the hassle of cooking. Make a playlist of songs that’s sure to create a romantic ambience, take this opportunity to serenade your significant other as you slow dance to music and fall in love with each other once more.

DISCOVER TO-GO

blogsEntriesData.title: Safe Space: Meetings, Events & Celebrations Made Safe

main.description:
Discovery Hospitality Corporation (safely) brings back familiar experiences in the new normal

July 26, 2020 / Manila: Over the past few months, we’ve all had to reweigh what it means to feel safe as we adapt to new ways of life. Heightened awareness. Increased distance. We’ve become more selective about where we go. We’ve secured our homes and workplaces. And while we’ve learned to adjust, thanks in great part to online resources, there are some things still meant to be shared in person.

Discovery Hospitality Corporation (DHC), the management company behind award-winning brands Discovery Shores Boracay, Discovery Primea Makati, Club Paradise Palawan, and Discovery Suites Ortigas, launches Safe Space, a trailblazing initiative re-imagining meeting, event and celebration spaces and making them safe in the time of the global pandemic.

From the launch of Home Safe program ensuring best practices in safety, service and care among Discovery’s hotels and resorts, to partnering with Lysol, Safe Space combines Discovery’s signature brand of hospitality and strong commitment to guests’ safety.

Working from home has its perks, but for times when face-to-face meetups are called-for, safe space has to be expanded beyond usual limits. With DHC’s shared Safe Space program, enjoy the comforts and safety of Discovery hotels.

Interview for an hour or the whole day. Meet professional partners: architects, educators, doctors, stylists within safe spaces inside Discovery Suites Ortigas and Discovery Primea Makati. Close deals in the city’s premium addresses. Select desired service through the Safe Space booking platform: book preferred schedule, pay online, and relish in luxurious spaces sanitized on a per-use basis. Get personal appointment calendar for Discovery meetups. Re-imagine co-working space at Discovery. Meeting spaces are sanitized after each use following DHC’s safety and sanitation protocols with Lysol products.

Once the government permits social gathering, Safe Space will likewise allow guests to enjoy essential moments in their safe space of choice (home, office or Discovery property) and focus more on what’s at hand. Birthdays, weddings, staff meetings, corporate events, DHC’s essential team will ensure a safe and responsible gathering based on guidelines set by no less than the Department of Tourism.

Can’t host in-house? DHC offers Space Rentals, taking care of the health and sanitation requirements, design, and other key elements with the client’s or its in-house event planners. Intimate get-togethers crafted with the utmost attention to detail, none too small. Re-imagine the new normal, and discover familiar, longed-for moments and enjoy new experiences in safe spaces. Find out more about Safe Space through www.safespace.com.ph today.

# # #

For more information, contact:

Josephine Concio
Vice President & Head of Strategic Initiatives

blogsEntriesData.title: 9 Indoor Activities to Keep You Busy This Summer

main.description:
Summer is finally here, and though we can’t go rushing to the beach just yet, there’s plenty to keep us busy in the great indoors. We’ve rounded up 9 activities you can enjoy whether you’re safely checked in or staying cozy at home.

 

Dig into your movie bucket list.

Oscar nominees, foreign language must-sees, old Hollywood classics, that documentary on global warming. We all have films we keep saying we’re going to watch but have never actually sat through. Now’s the perfect time to dust off those DVDs or clear out your Watch List. You might even pick up some travel inspo from what you watch!

 

Settle in with a good read.

Remember all those books you hoarded at the fair, posted on your Instagram stories, and immediately dumped on your bedside table? Time to pull a good read off the shelf! Or if you’re looking for something to listen to while cleaning up or cooking, audiobooks are a great way to multitask.

 

 

Try a new recipe.

Speaking of cooking, it’s time to contend with your market haul (shop responsibly, folks!) Look for inspiration from online food magazines, YouTube channels, even your favorite celebrities firing up their stoves and keeping their kitchens busy. Besides, you’re going to get tired of the same pasta recipe at some point.

 

Get moving.

Can’t go outdoors? Not an excuse to not exercise. Staying healthy involves sweating it out too. Download a fitness app, watch workout videos online, or even sign up for the livestream classes that some studios offer!

 

Put on your thinking cap.

Staying indoors shouldn’t keep you from flexing those brain muscles. Learn a new skill or sign up for an online class! There are plenty of free workshops and other resources you can look into that will certify you in a field of expertise over the course of a few weeks.

 

Start planning your next trip.

You don’t have to wait another month before setting things in motion for your dream destination! Pristine beaches in Boracay and Coron are going to be perfect for filling in your wanderlust gap. Try looking at a possible itinerary too so you can prepare arrangements for activities and know who to call as soon as you can. And of course, Discovery Shores Boracay and Club Paradise Palawan will be waiting to welcome you warmly for your summer holiday.

 

Go on virtual tours.

You don’t have to hop on a plane to get your culture fix! Museums all over the world are opening their virtual doors so you can still enjoy exhibits right from your couch. You can also check out plays and concerts streaming online for free!

 

Start a new passion project.

If you’ve always wanted to try your hand at painting or have been keeping that screenplay idea in your notes for years, now’s the perfect time to jump on those! Let those creative juices flow and stop feeling bad about never acting on that passion project. Tend to your garden, start that Instagram account for your pet, make new music–better late than never!

 

Help those in need.

Even if you can’t go out and extend a hand to those in need right now, there are ways to help! Reach out to organizations putting together donations for supplies if you can, stay tuned to the news for updates on areas and industries that need the most assistance, and try to uplift those around you with positivity and words of encouragement!

 

There’s plenty to keep you busy in the weeks to come! In the meantime, stay safe and healthy. We’ll see you soon!

blogsEntriesData.title: Top 10 Reasons to Return to Boracay Island When it Re-opens

main.description:
Here are the top 10 reasons why going back to one of the world’s best beaches and its famed Discovery Shores Boracay should be on your must-do list. Let this be your go-to Boracay guide for a vacation to remember.

 

1. The new Signature Suites are absolutely gorgeous.

The crown jewel of Discovery Shores Boracay, the Signature Suites is an exclusive wing of the resort with 11 indulgent room offerings, replete with its own infinity lounge pool – easily one of the best places to stay in Boracay.

It’s your chance to meet the Signature Suites’ very own Guest Experience Makers, or GEMs for short — since they’re dazzling like that! They’re there to give you a bespoke Boracay experience like no other.

 

2. The exclusive 360 Roof Lounge will make your jaw drop.

Guests of the Signature Suites can elevate their perspective at this lounge, with 360-degree panoramas over the island’s cerulean sea. Relax on the pool deck, laze in a hammock or decompress in a Jacuzzi or heated infinity lounge pool. The roof-lounge butler will make sure you have the most blissful moments.

 

3. An authentic Italian restaurant awaits.

If you’re looking for the best restaurants in Boracay, look no further than Discovery Shores Boracay’s newest culinary offering: Forno Osteria Kitchen and Bar, located by the courtyard of the Signature Suites. Open from breakfast through dinner, it serves mouthwatering Italian fare in a friendly, relaxed atmosphere with a bruschetta bar and a brick oven for pizza lovers.

 

4. The 88 suites had a noticeable facelift.

Refurbished and made even better, expect no less than a sparkling new room when you stay at Discovery Shores Boracay. Think brand new carpets, furniture, and even bathroom fixtures – Boracay accommodation at its finest.

 

5. Caffeine addicts are in for a treat.

For a pick-me-up between meals, the resort’s new offering, the Coffee Bar, serves espresso drinks, cold brew coffees, loose-leaf teas and an assortment of sweets for a sugar rush. Swirl. Sip. Repeat!

 

6. Indigo Restaurant is now bluer than blue with an exciting new menu.

Discovery Shores Boracay’s very own Indigo, one of the top restaurants in Boracay Island, now has “new” everything: from its open kitchen, menu, and wine list. Popular with guests and food critics alike, the coastal cuisine in Indigo is the perfect match to its prestigious collection of vino, consisting of New and Old-World vintages.

Indigo Restaurant at Discovery Shores Boracay

 

7. The bartenders from Sandbar have new tricks up their sleeves.

Aside from a refreshed look, one of the hippest watering holes in the island is overflowing with new cocktails to jazz up your sunset-watching sessions. Of course, Discovery Shores Boracay’s famous flavored mojitos will still be there to keep you satisfied.

Sandbar’s famous island cocktails in Boracay

 

8. Terra Wellness Spa is the place to be.

A stay in the island is not complete without a spa getaway in Boracay, featuring the signature massage at Terra Wellness Spa. The energy and excitement of a holiday in Boracay will make you look for a relaxing respite to throw your cares away. Indulge in the spa’s full lineup of rejuvenating treatments and pampering spa services, from practical after-sun rituals to meaningful wellness journeys.

Refreshing ginger tea at Terra Wellness Spa

 

9. It’s the perfect place to say “I do”.

blogsEntriesData.title: Discovery Eats: Where to Wine and Dine in Manila

main.description:
Through the years, Manila has become a sought-after foodie destination with its diverse culinary scene. From burgeoning food parks, well-loved neighborhood restos, and international franchises, dining in the pulsating city makes hungry diners spoilt for choice.

If you’re a discerning food and wine connoisseur and enjoy the finer things in life, then read further to find out more about the culinary gems of Discovery, located just around the metro.

 

22 Prime in Discovery Suites

Fancy a steak-cation? In the middle of bustling Ortigas is Discovery Suites, home to the meat lovers’ mecca 22 Prime. From the hotel lobby, simply take the elevator to the 22nd floor for a panoramic view of the city, an extensive wine selection, plus the friendliest waiters in town.

If you’re not sure on what to order, Executive Chef Gerwin Bailon recommends the juicy and fall-off-the-bone USDA Prime Tomahawk, paired with a bottle of Dado Cabernet Sauvignon, a fruity dark red wine with a hint of toasty vanilla.

DINING TIP: Watch out for the limited 1-800 PRIME events! P1,800 per person for unlimited steak, sides, dessert, and a glass of wine, all for a good cause. Be sure to check Discovery Suites on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter for updates on the next event! Partner beneficiary is an Aeta community in Tarlac through international NGO Waves for Water. Read more about it here.

22 Prime is open daily from 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

 

BOOK A TABLE

 

Restaurant Tapenade in Discovery Primea

If you’re craving for the tempting flavors of the Mediterranean, from Spain, Italy, France, Greece, Turkey and Morocco, Restaurant Tapenade should be your top-of-mind dining destination.

Famed for its bestselling Salad Room, hungry diners can expect an abundant spread of freshly-harvested greens, dressings and vinaigrettes, as well as flavored-oils, dips and salsas, cheese, charcuterie and fresh seafood.

Definitely try the Porcini-Crusted Ribeye for a meal fit for a king. The porcini’s umami flavor gives a mouthwatering kick to the tender meat, topped with flavorful arugula and shaved parmesan for an unforgettable dish. Pair it with Beringer Knights Valley Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon, the best accompaniment to a good ol’ steak.

Discover Makati’s best Mediterranean restaurant. Restaurant Tapenade is open daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

 

BOOK A TABLE

 

Flame Restaurant in Discovery Primea

Waiting for you on the 16th floor of Makati’s premier skyscraper are commanding views of the metro, an unobtrusive culinary team, and a live chandelier that’s good-on-gram. For an elevated dining experience, Flame Restaurant is the place to go. Delight in the epicurean flavors of modern Asian cuisine, the latest adaptation of Flame’s ever-evolving menu.

Looking for the Chef’s Recommendation? Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco swears by the Foie Gras Chawanmushi, a delectable Japanese egg custard appetizer available on the a la carte lunch menu. This is best paired with a glass of Ferrari Carano Fume Blanc, which is bursting with flavors of pink grapefruit, lemongrass, honeydew melon, guava, and orange blossom – the perfect match for ethnic Asian cuisine.

SOCIAL MEDIA TIP: Flame’s dishes are certified-Instagrammable. Get your Boomerang ready for the flaming Baked Alaska dessert, which comes with strawberry and pistachio ice cream, mixed berry compote and triple sec alcohol – a fiery way to conclude a memorable meal. Use the hashtags #FlameRestaurantPH #DiscoveryPrimea #MakatiSkyline.

Flame is open Mondays to Saturdays from 11:30 AM to 2:30 PM, and from 6 PM to 10 PM.

 

BOOK A TABLE

blogsEntriesData.title: The Self-Care Journey: Wellness Centers in the Philippines

main.description:
In a world where hustle and bustle culture has become part of the norm, it pays to be extra mindful of looking after one’s well-being through the art of self-care.

 

The importance of self-care

 

The concept of self-care has significantly evolved over the years, where it’s no longer viewed as mere luxurious indulgence but also as an important aspect of one’s holistic lifestyle.

In the Philippines, there is already a growing awareness when it comes to practicing self-care. It allows us to look after our mental, emotional, and physical well-being, which are all essential as we go about our daily lives. 

Are you looking to disconnect and unwind for a much-needed breather from your daily hustle? Take a deep breath as we walk you through our curated list of wellness center destinations in the Philippines.

 

Boracay

Boracay Island

 

Beyond its famous clear water and fine white sand beach, Boracay Island offers some of the best wellness center spots. Escape to this relaxing slice of paradise as you embark on a transformative journey, offering rejuvenation and nourishment of the mind, body, and soul.

 

Signature Oils at Terra Wellness Spa at Discovery Boracay (known as Discovery Shores Boracay)

 

Looking to connect with and be one with nature amid this tropical island paradise? From traditional Filipino therapy to specialized treatments, Terra Wellness Spa at Discovery Boracay will take you on a journey to tranquility and serenity as you reconnect in a sanctuary designed to help you float back to reality at your own pace.

 

Coron

Dimakya Island in Coron, Palawan

 

How about a transformative experience tucked away in the pristine natural beauty of Coron, Palawan? Situated far away from the fast-paced nature of urban life, Coron carves out a safe sanctuary where you can rekindle the harmony of the mind, body, and spirit.

 

The use of 100% coconut oil at Glow Spa at Discovery Coron (known as Club Paradise Palawan)

 

Hailing in an exclusive island paradise is Discovery Coron’s very own Glow Spa. Get immersed in an all-natural spa treatment using 100% coconut oil, that will not only soothe your senses but also protect the environment. The resort spa’s partnership with Above Aesthetic Clinic (AAC) pushes for the development of detoxification and rejuvenating treatments that combine Oriental and Western techniques.

 

Sipalay, Negros Occidental

 

Sipalay, Negros Occidental’s coastal view

 

Imagine waking up to the soothing sound of waves at a charming coastal destination like Sipalay, Negros Occidental. Amid picturesque landscapes, the island is an ideal sanctuary for those seeking solace and rejuvenation. Sipalay’s rich culture and warm hospitality can turn your getaway into an immersive journey toward finding inner balance.

 

A secluded spot at Linong Spa at Manami Resort

 

Known as a Sanctuary to the Senses, Linong Spa at Manami Resort is a state-of-the-art healing ground, offering the best fusion of nature’s healing magic and the genuine care of the human touch. The wellness center offers an ultimate sensory experience, where you can enjoy the views of the resort while getting lost in the rhythms of nature sounds and the soothing aroma of signature oils for a relaxed mind.

 

Makati

Ayala Triangle Park at night in Makati City

 

Amidst tall skyscrapers and the energetic pulse of the city, Makati City boasts hidden sanctuaries that provide an oasis of calm, one where you can soothe and recharge your senses.

 

Hammam Treatment at Terazi Spa at Discovery Primea

 

Among them is Terazi Spa at Discovery Primea, where a haven of understated elegance and unparalleled wellness services await you. Indulge in a selection of traditional and natural healing therapies. A Terazi Spa signature is the Turkish Bath or Hammam treatment, which makes use of meticulously sourced ingredients that are crafted to harmonize and rejuvenate the body and soul.

 

Now that you know some of the wellness center hotspots in the Philippines, where do you see yourself going first?
